Likert Questions.question: I believe in love at first sight.
I enjoy planning surprise dates for my partner.
I think expressing love through gifts is important.
I prefer romantic getaways over regular vacations.
I believe small romantic gestures are more meaningful than grand ones.
I believe in celebrating anniversaries in a special way.
I find it important to express my love verbally.
I enjoy receiving flowers as a romantic gesture.
I believe in lifelong commitment to a partner.
I believe in the power of love.
I believe that love is unconditional.
I believe that love is a powerful emotion.
I believe that love is a beautiful journey.
I believe that love is about understanding and acceptance.
I believe that love is about giving and receiving.
I believe that love is about trust and honesty.
I believe that love is about respect and admiration.
I believe that love is about patience and forgiveness.
I believe that love is about compromise and understanding.
I believe that love is about support and encouragement.
I believe that love is about friendship and companionship.
I believe that love is about sharing and caring.
I believe that love is about being there for each other.
I believe that love is about growing together.
I believe that true love lasts forever.
I believe that every day should be as romantic as Valentine's Day.
I believe that love is the greatest feeling.
I believe that love conquers all.
I believe in soul mates.
I believe that romance keeps a relationship strong.
